titles.title: Savior, Like a Shepherd Lead Us

v2

verse.lines: Early let us seek Thy favor, early let us do Thy will; do Thou, Lord, our only Savior, with Thy love our bosoms fill. Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus, Thou hast loved us; love us still.
